entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is described as looking terrible and not having slept until daybreak.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: A type of dark creature that draws near to Harry, causing him to hear a voice in his head.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is eating a Peppermint Toad and massaging his stomach. He reminds Harry that it's the first day of holidays.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is concerned about his well-being and suggests he must be upset about something.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: A ginger cat that is spread out in front of the fire.

relationships.description: Harry hears a voice inside his head whenever dementors draw near.
Ron reminds Harry that it's the first day of holidays.
Hermione is concerned about Harry's well-being and suggests he must be upset about something.
Crookshanks is spread out in front of the fire near Harry.
